attributes.action: Give decent law abiding people priority on council housing lists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the'points'system used at the moment to prioritise housing need,a young yob leaving prison will get more 'points' than a decent working youngster.
This results in the former receiving the key to a council flat often years ahead of the latter.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
